column8: explain
설명 임시
string
Unlimited Tower Gold
Dan's Gold
Expands your Servant Inventory slots by 5 spaces.
Expand your Monster Inventory slots by 5 spaces.
Expand your Equipment Inventory slots by 5 spaces.
Expand your Item Inventory slots by 5 spaces.
This scroll item is needed to increase your value by strengthening weapons.
This scroll item is needed to increase your value by strengthening armors.
This scroll item is needed to increase your value by strengthening accessories.
This item is usually required to enter the Normal stage.
This item is usually required to enter the Hard stage.
This item is usually required to enter the Nightmare stage.
This item is usually required to enter the Hell stage.
This is Powder of Warrior's Soul. The powder of soul is said to have mysterious power.
This is Powder of Thief's Soul. The powder of soul is said to have mysterious power.
This is Powder of Cleric's Soul. The powder of soul is said to have mysterious power.
This is Powder of Archer's Soul. The powder of soul is said to have mysterious power.
This is Powder of Magician's Soul. The powder of soul is said to have mysterious power.
It is an item that can summon one random Servant.
